goal: My GoCalendar is blocked for a mandatory conference from March 8th to 12th. I want to plan a week-long international trip immediately following it, departing from IAD. The total combined cost for the round-trip flight on FlyUnified and a StayNB with a kitchen must be under $1500. Pick any major European city. Once you find a suitable combination, block out my calendar for 'Europe Trip' and add the flight numbers and StayNB booking link to the event notes.

evals.description: Verify 'Europe Trip' event is created in GoCalendar with the correct title.
